name: Guerrilla Garden
description:
Real estate developer threaten to destroy your neighbourhood. Gear up, craft seed bombs and launch them onto the streets to fill them with plants and flowers :) 

A game crafted during UrbanJam in 48h by a team of 5 : 

Meryem Erikci - 2D Artist 

Mathias Jacquin-Ravot - Programmer

Guillaume Noisette - Programmer

Benjamin Vedrenne - 3D Artist - FX

Marie Vilain - Composer - Sound Designer - Project Manager
